meanings.definition: A woman who presents and coordinates a television or radio program.
meanings.sent1: The anchorwoman reported the news with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The anchorwoman on the morning show is very popular.
meanings.sent3: The anchorwoman accidentally spilled coffee on the news desk.
meanings.sent4: She is the anchorwoman of our team, keeping us steady in rough times.
meanings.sent5: Everyone trusts the anchorwoman to deliver the latest updates accurately.

meanings.definition: A woman who is a mainstay or support in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: The anchorwoman of the group always keeps everyone organized.
meanings.sent2: She is the anchorwoman of our family, holding us together.
meanings.sent3: The anchorwoman of the party brought the best snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her positivity is the anchorwoman that keeps us afloat.
meanings.sent5: In times of trouble, she is the anchorwoman we all rely on.
